name: Central European Development Forum
goal: Achievement of faster sustainable development of the Central european region/SEE   in terms of economic development and effective climate change policies. Research, education, public affairs, publishing and events are the instruments. Advocacy aggregation on behalf of and partnering with academia, industry and local governments.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, International co-operation and development, Youth
euInitiatives: Climate change, EU adaptation strategy for climate change,  EU funding climate action, Renewable Energy Directive, Country Progress Report
